usa: The United States officially withdraws from the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty.<sup id="cite_ref-9" class="reference">[9]</sup>
The No Child Left Behind Act education reform bill was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-10" class="reference">[10]</sup>
Beltway sniper attacks: Ten people were killed and three were injured in attacks around the Washington, D.C. area.[11]
The United States Department of Homeland Security was created.<sup id="cite_ref-12" class="reference">[12]</sup>
